title: League crashing during loading screen
body:
Hello there, I'm a first time forum poster, for a long time now, I've had a problem where in the loading screen, the game freezes irrevocably. Pressing ctrl+alt+delete will open the correct screen as expected, however the game cannot be closed by any means, I've tried task hacker, and others but the game simply cannot be closed. This forces me to restart my computer, my computer takes ~3 minutes to boot, so you can understand the problem. Below I will leave as much information as possible, and if I have ruined one of your games, I'm sorry.

Toshiba Satellite L50-A
(Not sure if this is specific enough)
Spotify and Skype seem to make this occur more often (?)
I think it has to do with my graphics card (Nvidia GeForce GT 740M) also a Intel Graphics 4600 (This is the integrated one [?])
And that's all I can think of the top of my head, my computer has had its drivers updated recently so there's that

replies.body:
Hey,

Sorrey to hear you're having problems, but I think you are on the right track with the driver updates.  Does this problem happen every game you play? or only sometimes?

One page that might help is the support page on [game crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) - the suggestions in there might give you some more things to try.

Let me know how you go.


Cheers
Mindstar
